title: New: TENDER – Legion
body:
This debut song from London’s **TENDER** reminds me a lot of [F.E.A.R.](https://www.

youtube.com/watch?v=8f8wAXDZ9D0) by Ian Brown, which is awesome (even down to referencing I Wanna Be Adored). Confident and elegant in composition, it definitely fits their motive of being “primarily interested in creating grooves with room to breathe.” Check it out below. Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
